relation.text: 1778 I am ashamed My Dear Miſs Hamilton of my own indolence , but I do asſure you , tho ' my pen has not been employ
says , as she seldom is of the same opinion two days
a fatiguing time , as we have scarcely an hour to ourselves , the past
underwent a reall persecution & by the end of the Winter
a change -- as to me , in almost thirteen Years
is placed just Vis a vis to the Vesuvius which now
now & then My Dr Miſs Hamilton ! upon reflection I dare not look
